title: Navigation, primary
cleaned_text: Aging & Disability Resource Center (ADRC) of Barron & Rusk Counties The ADRC of Barron & Rusk Counties provides Barron County and Rusk County residents with unbiased information related to aging or living with a disability. The goal is to help people maintain their independence by connecting them with the right resources. The ADRC serves older adults and people with disabilities, as well as the families, friends and caregivers who work with and care for them. To learn more, visit [adrcconnections.org](https://www.adrcconnections.org/).
